inclusion.criterion: Ischemic cardiomyopathy with reduced ejection fraction (EF ≤ 40%) estimated by cardiac
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MRI or echocardiography within 30 days before enrollment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Coronary Chronic Total Occlusion (CTO) associated with a previous MI confirmed by coronary angiography and late gadolinium enhancement MRI or myocardial perfusion imaging within 30 days before enrollment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (ICD) indication for primary prevention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has provided written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Documented sustained ventricular tachycardia before enrollment
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Class IV New York Heart Association (NYHA) heart failure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: CTOs not associated with a prior infarction in their territory
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute myocardial infarction (MI) or acute coronary syndrome
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
